Uses of Package
it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation

Packages that use it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation
it.apice.sapere.api.management This package contains all the entities dedicated to eco-laws scheduling. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space This package contains LSA-space interfaces. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space.core This package contains LSA-space internals interfaces. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space.core.impl This package contains LSA-space internals interfaces implementation. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation This package contains LSA-space observation features. 
it.apice.sapere.demo.agents.impl   
it.apice.sapere.management This package contains all the entities dedicated to eco-laws scheduling. 
it.apice.sapere.management.impl This package contains all the implementations dedicated to eco-laws scheduling. 
it.apice.sapere.node.agents This package contains the SAPEREagents taxonomy. 
it.apice.sapere.node.networking.obsnotif.impl This package contains the subsystem dedicated to the notification (and management) of remote observation of LSA-space events. 
it.apice.sapere.node.networking.utils.impl This package contains some utility classes for networking handling. 
it.apice.sapere.space This package contains it.apice.sapere.space entities tests. 
it.apice.sapere.space.observation.impl This package contains the implementation of the services required to handle an LSA-space (.space.observation). 
it.apice.sapere.testcase This package contains the implementation of a Test Case Scenario. 
 

Classes in it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation used by it.apice.sapere.api.management
SpaceEvent
           A SpaceEvent registers a modification in LSA-space status that should be interesting for an observer.
 

Classes in it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation used by it.apice.sapere.api.space
LSAObserver
           An LSA Observer is an entity capable of listening remarkable events that involve a specific LSA in the LSA-space.
 

Classes in it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation used by it.apice.sapere.api.space.core
LSAObserver
           An LSA Observer is an entity capable of listening remarkable events that involve a specific LSA in the LSA-space.
SpaceObserver
           An LSA-space Observer is an entity capable of listening remarkable events occurred inside the LSA-space.
 

Classes in it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation used by it.apice.sapere.api.space.core.impl

           An LSA Observer is an entity capable of listening remarkable events that involve a specific LSA in the LSA-space.

Classes in it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation used by it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation
LSAEvent
           An LSAEvent registers a modification of an LSA inside the LSA-space.
SpaceEvent
           A SpaceEvent registers a modification in LSA-space status that should be interesting for an observer.
SpaceOperationType
           Defines the type of operation that has been observed (on the LSA-space).
